Why Top Fund Managers Want Better HR A new area for investor activism: asking how firms manage and invest in their workforce By Lauren.Weber@wsj.com Sept. 8, 2015 6:02 p.m. ET 
Chief executives love to declare that “people are our greatest asset.” It is rarely clear what they mean, but a group of investors managing approximately $2.5 trillion is seeking to find out. 
With little fanfare, representatives from 24 funds, mostly union and public pension funds, have been meeting monthly for the past two years.
